title: Creating Two Points
text: We can create two points with the information given. We know that the town's population in $$2009$$ was $$1442$$, so we can create the point $$(2009,1442)$$. We are also given that the town's population in $$2012$$ was $$1868$$, so we can create another point $$(2012,1868)$$

title: The Slope Formula
text: The slope formula can be defined as follows: $$m=\frac{y1-y2}{x1-x2}$$, where (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) are the points on the line.
speech: The slope formula can be defined as follows:  m is equal to fraction, y 1 minus y 2, over, x 1 minus x 2,  , where (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) are the points on the line.

title: Using the Slope Formula
text: We can plug in the points $$(2009,1442)$$ and $$(2012,1868)$$ into the slope formula as shown. $$m$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{1868-1442}{2012-2009}$$.
